DEPLOYMENT_KEY.description: If you haven't received this from one of our team members, please contact sales@highlight.run for your deployment key.

FIREBASE_SECRET.description: Your secret generated from firebase - see how to get it at https://docs.highlight.run/docs/authentication-1.

REACT_APP_FIREBASE_CONFIG_OBJECT.description: Your app config object generated from firebase - see how to get it at https://docs.highlight.run/docs/authentication-1.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Your aws secret access key - see how to get it at https://docs.highlight.run/docs/authentication-1.

AWS_S3_BUCKET_NAME.description: Your aws s3 bucket name - see how to get it at https://docs.highlight.run/docs/authentication-1.
